title: Practical Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Rubric-Based Formative Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Core Competency in Elementary Social Studies Instructional Design and Assessment
context.additional_context: A course for elementary school teachers to strengthen social studies lesson design and assessment competencies. It combines a smartphone-based mobile learning platform with monthly in-person workshops.

learning_goals: Learners can create rubrics suitable for social studies assignments and clearly explain assessment criteria.
Learners can systematically diagnose learners' task performance processes using rubrics and provide constructive feedback.
Learners can operate a 3-stage revision-learning cycle (task drafting → feedback → improvement) based on formative assessment results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
